title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.57 - Record of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.57 - Record of proceedings

State Regulations

The record in any proceeding under this part will be
prepared by the Board in accordance with Section 302 of the State

Administrative Procedure Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.57

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
